testimonial.author: - Mar√≠a C., Pixel Resident

q1.question: What does the monthly price include?
q1.answer: Everything is included: furnished studio apartment, utilities (water, electricity, gas), high-speed internet, administration, common area cleaning and access to all amenities.

q2.question: Do I need a guarantor or co-signer?
q2.answer: No. You only need your valid ID document. This is one of our main benefits: no guarantor, no complications.

q3.question: What is the minimum stay?
q3.answer: The minimum stay is 1 month. We offer maximum flexibility to adapt to your needs, whether it's a short stay or long-term.

q4.question: How is the reservation process?
q4.answer: Super simple: 1) Complete the form, 2) We contact you in less than 1 hour, 3) Virtual or in-person visit, 4) Contract signing, 5) Move-in in 24-48 hours!

q5.question: What does the studio apartment include?
q5.answer: 29m¬≤ fully furnished: double bed, desk, equipped kitchen, private bathroom, closet, private balcony and additional room that you can use as an office or for guests.

q6.question: Can I receive visitors?
q6.answer: Yes, you can receive visitors in your studio apartment and in the common areas. We just ask that you respect the coexistence rules and established schedules.

q7.question: Do you accept pets?
q7.answer: Yes, we have a specially designed Pet Zone. We apply a small additional fee and some coexistence rules for everyone's wellbeing.

q8.question: Where are you located?
q8.answer: We are in north Bogot√°, on Autopista Norte with Calle 100. A strategic location with easy access to public transport, shopping centers and business district.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Pixel Living | Data Protection
meta.description: Learn how Pixel Living protects and handles your personal information in compliance with Colombian data protection laws.

introduccion.texto: At Pixel Living we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. By completing our forms, using our website, or communicating with us, you accept the conditions of this policy.

recoleccion.descripcion: We collect and store the following personal information:
lista: Nationality and country of residence (if you are a foreigner)

uso.titulo: 2. What do we use your data for?
uso.descripcion: We use your information solely to:
lista: Contact you and provide personalized information about Pixel Living
Manage booking requests and customer service
Comply with legal and immigration requirements in the case of foreigners
Improve our service and digital experience
Send you important communications related to your interest in Pixel Living
uso.adicional: We do not share, sell or transfer your personal data to third parties, unless required by law or requested by immigration authorities.

parrafos: Your data is stored securely and only accessed by authorized Pixel Living personnel.
We use technical and administrative measures to protect your information and prevent unauthorized access.

extranjeros.titulo: 4. Processing of personal data of foreigners
parrafos: If you are a foreign citizen or reside outside Colombia, your data will be processed in accordance with Colombia's Personal Data Protection Law (Law 1581 of 2012) and, when applicable, international data protection regulations (such as the European Union General Data Protection Regulation - GDPR).
Your data may be used to comply with legal, immigration and temporary accommodation requirements according to Colombian legislation and, if necessary, will be reported to competent authorities.

derechos.descripcion: As a user, you have the right to:
lista: Know, update and rectify your personal data
Request proof of authorization for the processing of your data
Be informed about the use we give to your information
File complaints with the Superintendency of Industry and Commerce if you consider there is misuse
derechos.adicional: You can exercise these rights by writing to us at: info@pixelliving.co

cookies.texto: Our website may use cookies to improve the browsing experience. You can configure your browser to accept or reject cookies according to your preference.

cambios.texto: Pixel Living may update this Privacy Policy at any time. The date of the last update will always appear at the beginning of this document.

contacto.descripcion: If you have questions, comments or wish to exercise your rights regarding your personal data, contact us:
contacto.cierre: By submitting your data through our forms, you declare that you have read and accepted this Privacy Policy.

meta.title: Terms and Conditions - Pixel Living | Coliving Bogot√°
meta.description: Read our terms and conditions of use for the coliving service at Pixel Living, Bogot√°. Clear and transparent policies.

encabezado.titulo: TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE ‚Äì PIXEL LIVING COLIVING

informacion_general.contenido: Welcome to Pixel Living SAS. These terms and conditions regulate access to and use of coliving services offered by Pixel Living in Bogot√°, Colombia. By booking, paying, or signing a contract with us, you accept these terms in their entirety, regardless of your nationality or country of residence.

contenido: Pixel Living SAS provides coliving services through the rental of furnished studio apartments and access to common areas, under established conditions and coexistence rules.
Coliving is exclusively aimed at adults.
Studio apartment reservations can be made through our official channels (website, email, WhatsApp, or in person).
The reservation will only be confirmed with advance payment and signing of required documents (Lease Agreement, Supplementary Agreement, and Common Areas Regulations).
Pixel Living SAS may request identity documents or background checks, and reserves the right of admission.
The minimum stay is one (1) month. Shorter stays will not be accepted.
Subletting, assignment, or transfer of usage rights is not permitted without written authorization from Pixel Living SAS.
Only persons authorized in the contract may occupy the studio apartment.
For foreign citizens, it is mandatory to present a valid passport and, if applicable, visa or residence permit in Colombia.

zonas_comunes.titulo: 4. Use of Common Areas and Services
contenido: The use of common areas is regulated by the Common Areas Regulations, which are mandatory to comply with.
Access may be restricted for maintenance, sanctions, or security reasons.
Residents must respect internal rules, schedules, and rights of other users.
Smoking, vaping, or consuming psychoactive substances is prohibited in any part of the building, except in the pet zone (Pet Zone), where smoking is allowed without affecting third parties.
Illegal activities, sexual exploitation of minors, or use of the property for commercial or tourist purposes like Airbnb are not permitted.
Exotic pets or species prohibited by Colombian law are not accepted.
Payment of rent and additional services is made according to the contract agreement.
The deposit is exclusively to cover damages, furniture, fixtures, or debts and cannot be applied to rent payment.
Failure to comply with these terms, the contract, or common area regulations may result in sanctions, service suspension, financial penalties, or immediate contract termination.
Sanctions and procedures are detailed in contractual documents and internal regulations.
Pixel Living SAS processes personal data in accordance with Colombia's Law 1581 of 2012 and international data protection regulations (GDPR for European Union citizens, when applicable).
The privacy policy is available on our website and can be requested at any time.
By using our services, you authorize the collection, storage, and use of your personal data for contractual and administrative purposes.
Pixel Living SAS may update these terms and conditions at any time. The current version will be the one published on the website at the time of booking or contract renewal.
These terms and conditions are governed by Colombian legislation.
For international users, any dispute will be resolved before competent authorities in Bogot√°, Colombia, without prejudice to the legislation of the resident's country of origin if applicable.

aceptacion.contenido: By booking, paying, digitally signing, or entering as a resident at Pixel Living, you declare that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms and Conditions, as well as the contractual documents and attached regulations.

contacto.titulo: For any inquiries, you can contact us at:
